message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many of our previous customers. It comes with exceptional features and benefits that I believe would be of great value to you. I am offering this product to you for $200. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value you're highlighting, $200 is a bit outside my budget. I'm interested in the product, and I'm willing to pay up to $150 for it.  Let me know if that works for you.
